class.name: CodeHighlighter
class.brief_description: A syntax highlighter intended for code.
class.description: By adjusting various properties of this resource, you can change the colors and font style of strings, comments, numbers, and other text patterns inside a [TextEdit] control.

method.name: add_color_region
method.description: Adds a color region (such as for comments or strings) from [param start_key] to [param end_key]. Both keys should be symbols, and [param start_key] must not be shared with other delimiters. If [param line_only] is [code]true[/code] or [param end_key] is an empty [String], the region does not carry over to the next line.

method.name: add_keyword
method.description: Sets the color, and the font style for a keyword. The keyword cannot contain any symbols except '_'.

method.name: add_keyword_color
method.description: Sets the color for a keyword. The keyword cannot contain any symbols except '_'.

method.name: add_member_keyword
method.description: Sets the color, and the font style for a member keyword. The member keyword cannot contain any symbols except '_'. It will not be highlighted if preceded by a '.'.

method.name: add_member_keyword_color
method.description: Sets the color for a member keyword. The member keyword cannot contain any symbols except '_'. It will not be highlighted if preceded by a '.'.

method.name: add_region
method.description: Adds a color / font style region (such as for comments or strings) from [param start_key] to [param end_key]. Both keys should be symbols, and [param start_key] must not be shared with other delimiters. If [param line_only] is [code]true[/code] or [param end_key] is an empty [String], the region does not carry over to the next line.

method.name: clear_color_regions
method.description: Removes all color regions.

method.name: clear_keyword_colors
method.description: Removes all keywords.

method.name: clear_keywords
method.description: Removes all keywords.

method.name: clear_member_keyword_colors
method.description: Removes all member keywords.

method.name: clear_member_keywords
method.description: Removes all member keywords.

method.name: clear_regions
method.description: Removes all color / font style regions.

method.name: get_color_regions
method.description: Returns color regions.

method.name: get_keyword_color
method.description: Returns the color for a keyword.

method.name: get_keyword_colors
method.description: Returns colors for keywords.

method.name: get_keyword_style
method.description: Returns the font style is used for a keyword.

method.name: get_member_keyword_color
method.description: Returns the color for a member keyword.

method.name: get_member_keyword_colors
method.description: Returns colors for member keywords.

method.name: get_member_keyword_style
method.description: Returns the font style is used for a member keyword.

method.name: has_color_region
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the start key exists, else [code]false[/code].

method.name: has_keyword
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the keyword exists, else [code]false[/code].

method.name: has_keyword_color
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the keyword exists, else [code]false[/code].

method.name: has_member_keyword
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the member keyword exists, else [code]false[/code].

method.name: has_member_keyword_color
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the member keyword exists, else [code]false[/code].

method.name: has_region
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the start key exists, else [code]false[/code].

method.name: remove_color_region
method.description: Removes the color region that uses that start key.

method.name: remove_keyword
method.description: Removes the keyword.

method.name: remove_keyword_color
method.description: Removes the keyword.

method.name: remove_member_keyword
method.description: Removes the member keyword.

method.name: remove_member_keyword_color
method.description: Removes the member keyword.

method.name: remove_region
method.description: Removes the color / font style region that uses that start key.

method.name: set_color_regions
method.description: Sets color regions.

method.name: set_keyword_colors
method.description: Sets colors for keywords.

method.name: set_member_keyword_colors
method.description: Sets colors for member keywords.

members.member: Sets color for functions. A function is a non-keyword string followed by a '('.
Sets the font style for functions. A function is a non-keyword string followed by a '('.
Color / font style for keywords, [Dictionary] keys are [code]"keyword"[/code] string, values are [Dictionary] with the following keys: [code]"color"[/code], [code]"style"[/code].
Color / font style for member keywords, [Dictionary] keys are [code]"member_keyword"[/code] string, values are [Dictionary] with the following keys: [code]"color"[/code], [code]"style"[/code].
Sets color for member variables. A member variable is non-keyword, non-function string proceeded with a '.'.
Sets the font style for member variables. A member variable is non-keyword, non-function string proceeded with a '.'.
Sets the font style for numbers.

Color / font style regions, [Dictionary] keys are [code]"start_key end_key"[/code] string, values are [Dictionary] with the following keys: [code]"color"[/code], [code]"style"[/code], and [code]text_segment[/code].
Sets the font style for symbols.
